technologies designed to fight

French auto supplier forvia introduced

water to be piped to a clear water pipe.
Meanwhile, French matx equipment manufacturer
Fobia has made decarbonization commitments
as it provides solutions to
car manufacturers by
using spare parts to make cars that are made of carbon.
Recycled plastic is used to make the base for the
car body and seat cushions, in addition to many
hard recycled materials used to make bonnets and seats,
and then the seat frame is made of
recycled steel called green steel with a
new process that allows zero CO2 emissions.
During the steel production process
on October 13, the people of the town of
Bantan in Bulgaria celebrated the
traditional Suva Masquerade.
This masquerade was born from an ancient custom
with the purpose of purifying and bringing
Good luck to everyone on the occasion of the new year.
Suva festival takes place on January 13 and 14
every year, making the peaceful pace of life
in Batan town become
more lively than ever. We visited each
house.  in town to wish
them good health and prosperity. We
share our life experiences with each other,
creating a festive atmosphere that reaches every
house, even for just 5 minutes. Everyone here is
eagerly waiting for the event.  This year,
the festival takes place with many activities,

also the competition of Trang Biu h groups

creating costumes, performing
